snippet.title: Super Mario World Redone (SMW Hack)(Longplay)
snippet.description:
Hack: Super Mario World Redone - smw if it good
Author: Dark Prince
Lenght: 98 Exits
Difficulty: Vanilla
Thread: https://www.smwcentral.net/?p=viewthread&t=123841

Back at it again with the SMW overhauls, this time we have "SMW Redone", another hack of the original that replaces the graphics and some tracks. 
I don't have much to say, It's the original game with another coat of paint, I can see the effort put in this hack, the graphical overhaul is gorgeous, and apparently there's 2 secret levels that I didn't find, not even by looking at LM.

Overall this is a good overhaul, but Iff I'm honest, I still prefer "Super Mario World: Super Mario Bros. 4 Deluxe" when it comes to OG SMW reworks, but this is still a good work.

If you have the chance, give this one a try
